00034 #ifndef USART_H
00035 #define USART_H
00036 
00037 #include <avr/io.h>
00038 #include <stdint.h>

00040 
00041 typedef enum
00042 {
00043     usart_mode_asynchronous = 0,
00044     usart_mode_synchronous = 1
00045 } usart_mode_t;
00046 
00047 
00048 typedef enum
00049 {
00050     parity_none = 0,
00051         parity_even = 1,
00052     parity_odd = 2
00053 } usart_parity_t;
00054 
00055 typedef enum
00056 {
00057         baud_1200 = 1200,
00058         baud_2400 = 2400,
00059         baud_4800 = 4800,
00060         baud_9600 = 9600,
00061         baud_19200 = 19200,
00062         baud_38400 = 38400,
00063         baud_57600 = 57600 // 3/17/11 JWP
00064 } usart_baud_t;
00065 
00066 // JWP 3/21/11
00067 typedef enum
00068 {
00069     bit5 = 5,
00070     bit6 = 6,
00071     bit7 = 7,
00072         bit8 = 8,
00073         bit9 = 9
00074 } usart_databits_t;
00075 
00076 typedef enum
00077 {
00078         stopbit1 = 1,
00079         stopbit2 = 2
00080 } usart_stopbits_t;     
00081 
00082 typedef enum
00083 {
00084     flow_none = 0,
00085     flow_sw = 1,
00086     flow_hw = 2
00087 } usart_flow_control_t;
00088 
00089 typedef struct
00090 {
00091     usart_flow_control_t flow_control;
00092     uint8_t flow_out;
00093     uint8_t flow_in;
00094 } usart_flow_t;
00095 
00096 typedef struct
00097 {
00098     usart_baud_t baud;
00099     usart_parity_t parity;
00100     usart_flow_control_t flow_control;
00101 } usart_port_settings_t;

00104 #define usart_baudrate2setting(f_cpu, baud)             (uint16_t)(((uint32_t)(f_cpu) / ((uint32_t)(baud) * (uint32_t)16)) - 1)

00111 // Begin changes 3/17/11 JWP

00119 // 3/18/11 JWP added Atmega169
00120 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega169__)
00121    // ATMega with one uart that doesn't use 0 after register/bit names
00122    // like ATmega169
00123    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_HIGH                  UBRRH
00124    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_LOW                   UBRRL
00125    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A    UCSRA
00126    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B    UCSRB
00127    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C    UCSRC
00128 
00129    #define UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER              TXEN
00130    #define UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER                 RXEN
00131    #define UART_READY_TO_TRANSMIT               UDRE
00132    #define UART_TRANSMIT_COMPLETE               TXC
00133    #define UART_RECEIVE_COMPLETE                RXC
00134    #define UART_DATA_REG                                UDR
00135    #define UART_STOP_BIT_SELECT                 USBS
00136    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0                UCSZ0
00137    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1                UCSZ1
00138    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2                UCSZ2
00139    #define UART_MODE_SELECT                             UMSEL
00140    #define UART_DOUBLE_SPEED                    U2X
00141    #define UART_FRAME_ERROR                             FE
00142    #define UART_DATA_OVER_RUN                   DOR
00143    #define UART_PARITY_ERROR                    UPE
00144    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_0                   UPM0
00145    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_1                   UPM1
00146    #define UART_MULTI_PROCESSOR_COMMUNICATION_MODE      MPCM
00147    #define UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    TXCIE
00148    #define UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    RXCIE
00149    #define UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    UDRIE
00150    #define UART_RX_DATA_BIT_8   RXB8
00151    #define UART_TX_DATA_BIT_8   TXB8
00152 
00153 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega128__) \
00154 || defined(__AVR_ATmega1281__) \
00155 || defined(__AVR_ATmega2561__) \
00156 || defined(__AVR_ATmega328P__)
00157 
00158    // ATMega with two uarts - uart 0
00159    // or with one uart but using 0 in register/bit names (like ATmega328)
00160    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_HIGH                  UBRR0H
00161    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_LOW                   UBRR0L
00162    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A    UCSR0A
00163    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B    UCSR0B
00164    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C    UCSR0C
00165 
00166    #define UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER              TXEN0
00167    #define UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER                 RXEN0
00168    #define UART_READY_TO_TRANSMIT               UDRE0
00169    #define UART_TRANSMIT_COMPLETE               TXC0
00170    #define UART_RECEIVE_COMPLETE                RXC0
00171    #define UART_DATA_REG                                UDR0
00172    #define UART_STOP_BIT_SELECT                 USBS0
00173    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0                UCSZ00
00174    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1                UCSZ01
00175    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2                UCSZ02
00176    #define UART_MODE_SELECT                             UMSEL // ATmega128 
00177    #define UART_MODE_SELECT_0                   UMSEL00
00178    #define UART_MODE_SELECT_1                   UMSEL01
00179    #define UART_DOUBLE_SPEED                    U2X0
00180    #define UART_FRAME_ERROR                             FE0
00181    #define UART_DATA_OVER_RUN                   DOR0
00182    #define UART_PARITY_ERROR                    UPE0
00183    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_0                   UPM00
00184    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_1                   UPM01
00185    #define UART_MULTI_PROCESSOR_COMMUNICATION_MODE      MPCM0
00186    #define UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    TXCIE0
00187    #define UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    RXCIE0
00188    #define UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    UDRIE0
00189    #define UART_RX_DATA_BIT_8   RXB80
00190    #define UART_TX_DATA_BIT_8   TXB08
00191 #else
00192    #error "no uart definition for MCU"
00193 #endif
00194 
00195 // GCC compiler specific.
00196 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega128__) \
00197 || defined(__AVR_ATmega1281__) \
00198 || defined(__AVR_ATmega2561__) \
00199 || defined(__AVR_ATmega169__)
00200         #define usart0_receive_interrupt_service_routine        ISR(USART0_RX_vect)
00201         #define usart0_transmit_interrupt_service_routine       ISR(USART0_UDRE_vect)
00202 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega328P__)
00203         #define usart0_receive_interrupt_service_routine        ISR(USART_RX_vect)
00204         #define usart0_transmit_interrupt_service_routine       ISR(USART_UDRE_vect)
00205 #else
00206    #error "no interrupt definition for MCU"
00207 #endif
00208 
00209 
00210 // API
00211 
00212 // ATmega169 only has UMSEL
00213 // ATmega128 only has UMSEL0
00214 // ATmega1281, 2561, 328P, have UMSEL0 and UMSEL1
00215 
00216 // Select synchronous or asynchronous mode
00217 // Note: if you add a device carefully check the bits used
00218 // UMSELn 1 asynchronous
00219 // UMSELn 0 synchronous
00220 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega128__)
00221     #define usart0_mode(x)          bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_MODE_SELECT))
00222 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega169__)
00223     #define usart0_mode(x)          bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_MODE_SELECT))
00224 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega1281__) \
00225 || defined(__AVR_ATmega2561__) \
00226 || defined(__AVR_ATmega328P__) \
00227 || defined(__AVR_ATmega169__)
00228     #define usart0_mode(x)      (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C = (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C & (uint8_t)~((1<<UART_MODE_SELECT_0)|(1<<UART_MODE_SELECT_1))) | (uint8_t)((x) << UART_MODE_SELECT_0))
00229 #else
00230    #error "no usart0_mode(x) definition for MCU"
00231 #endif
00232 
00233 // End changes
00234 #define usart0_clock_polarity(x)    bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UCPOL0))
00235 
00236 #define usart0_transmit_enable()    (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER))
00237 #define usart0_transmit_disable()   (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER))
00238 
00239 #define usart0_receive_enable()     (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER))
00240 #define usart0_receive_disable()    (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER))
00241 
00242 #define usart0_transmit_speed_double_enable()   (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_DOUBLE_SPEED))
00243 #define usart0_transmit_speed_double_disable()  (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_DOUBLE_SPEED))
00244 
00245 #define usart0_receive_complete()           bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_RECEIVE_COMPLETE))
00246 
00247 #define usart0_transmit_complete()          bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_TRANSMIT_COMPLETE))
00248 
00249 #define usart0_data_register_empty()        bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_READY_TO_TRANSMIT))
00250 
00251 #define usart0_frame_error()                bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_FRAME_ERROR))
00252 
00253 #define usart0_data_overrun()               bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_DATA_OVER_RUN))
00254 
00255 #define usart0_parity_error()               bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_PARITY_ERROR))
00256 
00257 #define usart0_multiprocessor_mode(x)       bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_MULTI-PROCESSOR_COMMUNICATION_MODE))
00258 
00259 #define usart0_receive_complete_interrupt_enable()      (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00260 #define usart0_receive_complete_interrupt_disable()     (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00261 
00262 #define usart0_receive_complete_interrupt_get()         (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B & (1 << UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00263 
00264 #define usart0_transmit_complete_interrupt_enable()     UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE)
00265 #define usart0_transmit_complete_interrupt_disable()    UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE)
00266 
00267 #define usart0_transmit_complete_interrupt_get()        (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B & (1 << TXCIE0))
00268 
00269 #define usart0_data_register_empty_interrupt_enable()   (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00270 #define usart0_data_register_empty_interrupt_disable()  (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00271 
00272 #define usart0_data_register_empty_interrupt_get()      bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00273 
00274 #define usart0_receive_data_bit_8(x)                    bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_RX_DATA_BIT_8))
00275 
00276 #define usart0_transmit_data_bit_8(x)                   bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_tX_DATA_BIT_8))
00277 
00278 #define usart0_stop_bits_set(stop_bits) \
00279 do{                                     \
00280     if((stop_bits) >= 1 && (stop_bits) <= 2)    \
00281     {                                           \
00282         bit_write((stop_bits) - 1, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_STOP_BIT_SELECT)); \
00283     }                                           \
00284 }while(0)
00285 
00286 
00287 #define usart0_data_bits_set(data_bits) \
00288 do{         \
00289     if((data_bits) >= 5 && (data_bits) <= 8)    \
00290     {       \
00291         bit_write(bit_read(((data_bits) - 5), BIT(0)), UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0)); \
00292         bit_write(bit_read(((data_bits) - 5), BIT(1)), UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1)); \
00293         bit_clear(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2));     \
00294     }       \
00295     if((data_bits) == 9)    \
00296     {       \
00297         bit_set(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0));    \
00298         bit_set(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1));    \
00299         bit_set(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2));    \
00300     }       \
00301 }while(0)
00302 
00303 #define usart0_rts_enable()     bit_clear(USART0_RTS_PORT, USART0_RTS)
00304 
00305 #define usart0_rts_disable()    bit_set(USART0_RTS_PORT, USART0_RTS)
00306 
00307 #define usart0_rts_init()   \
00308 do{     \
00309     usart0_rts_enable();    \
00310     bit_set(USART0_RTS_PORT_DIRECTION, USART0_RTS); \
00311 }while(0)
00312 
00313 #define usart0_cts_read()       bit_read(USART0_CTS_PORT, USART0_CTS)
00314 
00315 #define usart0_cts_init()   \
00316 do{     \
00317     bit_clear(USART0_CTS_PORT_DIRECTION, USART0_CTS); \
00318 }while(0)
